channel.title: Books on Another Machine Learning hyped blog
channel.description: Recent content in Books on Another Machine Learning hyped blog

item.title: Books readed in 2018
item.description: July Historia de la Economia, by John Kenneth Galbraith June Fundación, by Isaac Asimov May Python Tricks: The Book, by Dan Bader March Ten peor coche que tu vecino, by Luis Pita February Poor dad, rich dad, by Robert T. Kiyosaki January Hacking Growth, by Sean Ellis & Morgan Brown

item.title: Books readed in 2017
item.description: December Cartes des de Caubet, by Josep-Joan Rosselló Cuní November Clean Architecture, by Robert C. Martin October Matchmakers: The new economics of multisided platforms, by David S. Evans & Richard Schmalensee September Irresistible APIs, by Kirsten L. Hunter Homo Deus, by Yuval Noah Harari Confesions of the Pricing Man, by Hermann Simon August Practical Statistics for Data Scientists, by Peter Bruce & Andrew Bruce July Headstrong: 52 Women Who Changed Science-and the World, by Rachel Swaby

item.title: Books readed in 2016
item.description: December Data Science for Business, by Foster Provost and Tom Fawcett November Refactoring, by Martin Fowler October Clean Code, by Robert C. Martin Art of Data Science, by Roger D. Peng and Elizabeth Matsui September Sapiens, by Yuval Noah Harari How not to be wrong, by Jordon Ellenberg August The second machine age, by Erik Brynjolfsson and Andrew McAfee Doing Data Science, by Cathy O’Neil and Rachel Schutt
